captions.text:
l can sing better than
Cry-Baby Walker
any day of the week.

<i>#</i> Well, l'm in here
'cause l drive too fast <i>#</i>

<i>#</i> And l'm too young
to have a criminal past <i>#</i>

<i>#</i> Some good behavior
would be all right <i>#</i>

<i>#</i> But l don't seem
to qualify <i>#</i>

<i>#</i> l'm just out
for a little fun <i>#</i>
<i>#</i> But l'm guilty till l'm 21 <i>#</i>

<i>#</i> l guess l'm doing time
for being young <i>#</i>

<i>#</i> So cut these
shackles off of me <i>#</i>

(all)
<i>#</i> Let me go, let me go <i>#</i>

<i>#</i> This kind of suit
don't set me free <i>#</i>
<i>#</i> Set me free, set me free <i>#</i>

<i>#</i> Well, l can't live
if l can't ride <i>#</i>
<i>#</i> Let me ride, let me ride <i>#</i>

<i>#</i> And l want my baby
by my side <i>#</i>
<i>#</i> l want my baby by my side <i>#</i>

<i>#</i> l'm just out
for a little fun <i>#</i>
<i>#</i> But l'm guilty till l'm 21 <i>#</i>

<i>#</i> l guess l'm doing time
for being young <i>#</i>

<i>#</i> Now, l can't
let the right thing <i>#</i>
<i>#</i> Stand in my way <i>#</i>

<i>#</i> Someday, baby,
l'll know better <i>#</i>

<i>#</i> But right now
l'm making my pay <i>#</i>

<i>#</i> What do l do,
who do l thank? <i>#</i>

<i>#</i> What can l do?
What can l do? <i>#</i>

<i>#</i> To get me out of
this stinking tank <i>#</i>

<i>#</i> Stinking tank
Stinking tank <i>#</i>

<i>#</i> lt's heartbreaking
to be this age <i>#</i>

<i>#</i> Stuck in a cage
Stuck in a cage <i>#</i>

<i>#</i> Locked in the prison
of teenage rage <i>#</i>

<i>#</i> Stuck in a cage
with a teenage rage <i>#</i>

<i>#</i> Well, l was out
for a little fun <i>#</i>

<i>#</i> l guess l'm guilty
till l'm 21 <i>#</i>

<i>#</i> l must be doing time
for being young <i>#</i>

<i>#</i> Stuck in a cage
with a teenage rage <i>#</i>
